import React from 'react' import './About.css' import Typewriter from 'typewriter-effect' import { Link } from 'react-scroll' import { Fade } from 'react-reveal' import Section from '../section/Section' import Skills from '../skills/Skills' const About = () => { return (

我们是谁 ?

我是“坦克”{' '} 😄 {' '}

⚡ {' '} I'm a software engineer focusing on Front-End web and emerging tech such as VR, AR and Blockchain. 我是一个开发者，专注于手机端原生App得开发，也掌握包括Springboot和react的技术。

⚡ {' '} You can find me working with UE5, JavaScript, React, Vue, Node, Apollo and Gatsby. 从事互联网行业已有10年，比较熟悉的技术包括，swift、Objective-C、Springboot、react

⚡ {' '} 我喜欢

.

我的编程生涯始于2015年，开始学习android端技术，后期在网络自学 解锁了包括iOS、Springboot+react等技术{' '} projects , worked at some{' '} amazing places , and worked with some great people.

Sydney, Australia
) } export default About
